user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screenshot displays an Amazon product page for a refurbished MacBook Air priced at $390. It includes details such as the delivery date (Monday, November 14), shipping fees to the Netherlands, and product condition (excellent, backed by a 90-day Amazon Renewed Guarantee). The product is in stock, and options to add it to the cart or buy now are available. The seller is Platinum Deals, and it ships from Amazon.

click on the second search suggestion located at middle and upper part of the screen.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.

think_action.Thought: The user wants to add a MacBook Air to the Amazon cart and view the shopping cart. The current screen shows the product page for a refurbished MacBook Air, which is in stock. There is an 'Add to Cart' button visible, which is the necessary step to fulfill the request. The previous actions show attempts to navigate Amazon and locate the product but do not yet indicate that the product has been added to the cart.
Future Action Plan: Click on the 'Add to Cart' button.
